description: JSON Schema for layout class in Elephant Lexicon

adjustable_area_sq_ft.description: Adjustable area in square feet used for planning or reconfiguration (e.g., flex or convertible spaces).

area_under_air_sq_ft.description: Air-conditioned area under air (A/C) in square feet.

bathroom_renovation_date.description: Date this bathroom was last remodeled (BLD/RES/COM/PLU/ELE).

building_number.description: The building number identifying which building the room or space is located in (useful for multi-building properties or complexes).

built_year.description: The year in which the layout built.

cabinet_style.description: Visual cabinet style present in the room, if any.

clutter_level.description: Amount of visible clutter or personal items in the room.

condition_issues.description: AI-observed visual condition issues in the room.

countertop_material.description: Material of visible countertops, if present.

design_style.description: Dominant design style observed in the room.

floor_level.description: The floor level the room is on, useful for multi-story properties.

flooring_installation_date.description: Date flooring in this space was installed (BLD/RES/COM).

flooring_material_type.description: Refers to the type of material used for a floor.

furnished.description: Indicates whether the room is furnished and to what extent.

has_windows.description: Whether the room has windows or not (relevant for egress and lighting).

heated_area_sq_ft.description: Heated area (served by permanent heating) in square feet. Typically overlaps living area under air.

is_exterior.description: Indicates whether the space is exterior or interior.

is_finished.description: Whether the room is finished (especially important for basements, attics, garages).

kitchen_renovation_date.description: Date this kitchen was last remodeled (BLD/RES/COM).

lighting_features.description: Observed lighting fixtures and types in room.

livable_area_sq_ft.description: Heated living area in square feet (habitable space excluding garages, porches, and unfinished areas).

paint_condition.description: Visual state of paint within the room.

pool_condition.description: Overall visible condition of the pool structure (tiles, lining, coping, etc.).

pool_equipment.description: List of visible pool-related equipment such as pumps, heaters, or covers.

pool_surface_type.description: The visible material or finish used for the pool’s interior surface.

pool_type.description: Specifies the structural or functional type of the pool if applicable to this room.

pool_water_quality.description: The observed quality or clarity of the pool water in the image.

request_identifier.description: Identifier value that should be substituted into the source HTTP request to retrieve this specific data.

safety_features.description: Visible safety features such as fencing, alarms, slip-resistant surfaces, or pool covers.

source_http_request.description: HTTP request configuration for retrieving this data.

body.description: The body of the request, which may contain JSON or other data formats.

content-type.description: Content-Type header for the request, indicating the media type of the resource.

url.description: The URL endpoint for the request.

spa_type.description: Specifies the type of spa or hot tub present, if applicable.

space_index.description: An index number representing the order of each space type in the property layout.

space_type.description: The function or designation of the room.

space_type_index.description: An index number representing the order of each space type and index in the property layout

total_area_sq_ft.description: Total enclosed building area in square feet, including all finished and unfinished spaces.

view_type.description: The dominant view visible from this room.

visible_damage.description: List of visible damage types (e.g. mold, stains, cracks, broken fixtures).

window_material_type.description: Refers to the type of material a window is made from.

window_treatment_type.description: Refers to the type of window treatment that covers the windows.

title: layout
